transition-expand/easing.description: Transition animation easing. Should be a valid CSS transition timing function.

transition-expand/no-opacity.description: Whether to not animate the element opacity.

transition-expand/appear.description: Whether to apply a transition on the initial render of a node.

transition-expand/group.description: Whether the component should be a transition-group component.

transition-expand/tag.description: Transition tag, in the case of using a transition-group.

transition-expand/no-move.description: Whether to not animate elements positions changing, in the case of using a transition-group.

transition-expand/move-duration.description: Duration of animation of elements positions changing, in the case of using a transition-group.

transition-expand/axis.description: Axis by which the element should be expand ('x'|'y').

transition-fade/easing.description: Transition animation easing. Should be a valid CSS transition timing function.

transition-fade/appear.description: Whether to apply a transition on the initial render of a node.

transition-fade/group.description: Whether the component should be a transition-group component.

transition-fade/tag.description: Transition tag, in the case of using a transition-group.

transition-fade/no-move.description: Whether to not animate elements positions changing, in the case of using a transition-group.

transition-fade/move-duration.description: Duration of animation of elements positions changing, in the case of using a transition-group.

transition-scale/easing.description: Transition animation easing. Should be a valid CSS transition timing function.

transition-scale/no-opacity.description: Whether to not animate the element opacity.

transition-scale/appear.description: Whether to apply a transition on the initial render of a node.

transition-scale/group.description: Whether the component should be a transition-group component.

transition-scale/tag.description: Transition tag, in the case of using a transition-group.

transition-scale/no-move.description: Whether to not animate elements positions changing, in the case of using a transition-group.

transition-scale/move-duration.description: Duration of animation of elements positions changing, in the case of using a transition-group.

transition-scale/scale.description: The element scale value before/after the transition.

transition-slide/easing.description: Transition animation easing. Should be a valid CSS transition timing function.

transition-slide/no-opacity.description: Whether to not animate the element opacity.

transition-slide/appear.description: Whether to apply a transition on the initial render of a node.

transition-slide/group.description: Whether the component should be a transition-group component.

transition-slide/tag.description: Transition tag, in the case of using a transition-group.

transition-slide/no-move.description: Whether to not animate elements positions changing, in the case of using a transition-group.

transition-slide/move-duration.description: Duration of animation of elements positions changing, in the case of using a transition-group.

transition-slide/offset.description: The element offset by x and y axis before/after the transition. Should be an integer or a string representation of percentage value.
